subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, Dec. 9 — The Giants were already scampering to a celebration near their bench late in the fourth quarter when Philadelphia receiver Jason Avant raised his arm to make a last-ditch appeal for an official — any official — to pull out his yellow flag and fling it.
